Author: withextracheesepls
Text: yup. my boyfriend mentions how he loves how small i am or easy to throw around (not in a mean way lol don’t worry) or how well i fit in his lap. shit like that. i live for it and he’s incredibly supportive ab my ED, always urges me to eat enough if i haven’t and says he’s proud of me and doesn’t get mad at me if i fuck up and binge or purge or lax- and i know he would still love me if i gained 20 lbs but uh..... idk it just raises my refusal to gain weight from 100% to 120% i suppose

Author: NyanDerp
Text: Jesus, I feel that.  My boyfriend always compliments me on how light I am and how easy to hug I am because of it, but he also says that I need to stop engaging in restrictive behaviors. He constantly praises how I look, but then expects me to make a full recovery. He's TOO supportive lol.
